text: 23.35: Stt 4.8 naŋga, 2 Sto 24.20-21 naŋga, Hi 11.4Kamataharɨm kru sɨhanaŋga pɨrɨ nɨñɨndu tɨtɨtaya kɨndu haŋɨnɨŋ yɨvutatamandu haŋɨnɨŋɨndu pɨmɨ ha, narɨ naŋgandaya kɨyɨmandɨ. Kru tɨtɨtaya kɨndu haŋɨnɨŋ yɨvutatamamara. Abelɨyɨ kɨta patavata Berikia ñanɨŋ Sekaraiaŋ tɨmu Gotɨŋ kɨrañɨŋguhu pina, tamu Gotɨŋ kɨrañɨŋguhu tavɨ pɨrɨŋɨmbɨrɨŋ tamata yɨvutatamamara. Kamataharɨm ñamba vana kandɨhañɨndu pɨmɨ ha narɨŋambi kavɨrɨmandɨra.
